infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos. $(PRODUCT_NAME) applies borders to multiple images. It requires access to the media library (photos) to load images, and add borders to them.

plugins.photosPermission: $(PRODUCT_NAME) applies borders to multiple images. It requires access to the media library (photos) to load images, and add borders to them.
